description:
Le Male Eau De Toilette - The Iconic Masculine Fragrance

Discover the legendary Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male, a powerful and seductive men's fragrance that has defined masculine perfumery since 1995. This bestselling scent comes housed in the iconic male torso bottle that has become a true collector's item. âœ¨

The Story Behind Le Male Eau De Toilette

Created by perfumer Francis Kurkdjian, Le Male revolutionized men's fragrances with its bold combination of contrasting notes. The iconic sailor-striped bottle designed by Jean Paul Gaultier represents masculinity and strength, making it instantly recognizable worldwide. This legendary cologne has maintained its status as one of the most popular men's fragrances for nearly three decades. ðŸ”¥

Product Information

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
125ml Men Eau De Toilette Medium Jean Paul Gaultier

Fragrance Notes

Top Notes Heart Notes Base Notes
Mint, Lavender, Bergamot, Cardamom Cinnamon, Orange Blossom, Caraway Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Amber, Sandalwood, Cedar

Key Features of Le Male EDT

  • Iconic sailor-striped bottle design ðŸ’Ž
  • Long-lasting aromatic fougere fragrance (8+ hours)
  • Perfect balance of fresh and warm notes
  • Versatile for day and evening wear
  • Strong projection and sillage
  • Timeless masculine appeal that never goes out of style

The Le Male fragrance opens with an invigorating burst of mint and lavender, creating a fresh, aromatic introduction. The heart reveals a spicy warmth of cinnamon and orange blossom that adds depth and character. The base notes of vanilla and tonka bean provide a sweet, sensual foundation that lingers on the skin for hours. This popular cologne masterfully balances freshness with warmth, making it perfect for year-round wear. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Le Male Eau De Toilette last on skin?
Le Male EDT is renowned for its exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on most skin types. The vanilla and tonka bean base notes create a long-lasting foundation, while the projection remains strong for the first 3-4 hours before settling into a more intimate scent. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin and consider layering with other Jean Paul Gaultier body products. ðŸ’«

Experience the timeless appeal of Jean Paul Gaultier Le Male - a masculine fragrance that continues to captivate and seduce with its perfect balance of freshness and sensuality. Add this signature scent to your collection today! ðŸŒ¸
